# === Media ===
# AI-irrelevant media files (waste context tokens)
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Images
*.png
*.jpg
*.jpeg
*.gif
*.bmp
*.tiff
*.webp
*.avif
*.ico

# SVG (can contain useful markup, uncomment to exclude)
# *.svg

# Audio
*.mp3
*.wav
*.ogg
*.flac
*.aac
*.wma
*.m4a

# Video
*.mp4
*.webm
*.avi
*.mov
*.mkv
*.wmv
*.flv
*.m4v

# Raw media
*.raw
*.cr2
*.nef
*.psd
*.ai
